cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SI, cs.CL 

Reasoning: The paper proposes a novel semi-supervised graph learning method that incorporates label information into the graph construction stage. This is a common problem in machine learning and falls under the category of graph-based semi-supervised learning, which is typically studied in the sub-fields of machine learning, artificial intelligence, computer vision, and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CV (Computer Vision), cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), and cs.CL (Computation and Language).
